metadata.description:
Live at Nihon Seinenkan Hall, 14 Sep.2003

01 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged & Performed by: Ashura Benimaru Itoh (伊藤あしゅら紅丸)
02 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita (貫田 重夫) / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.)
03 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Koji Kondo / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.), Koji Kondo
04 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.) / Chorus: Seiko (聖子)
05 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.), Seiko / Lyrics: Nippon Broadcasting System (ニッポン放送)
06 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.)
07 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Yoshihiro Arita / Performed by: Yoshihiro Arita with his band
08 Composition: Kazumi Totaka / Arranged by: Yoshihiro Arita / Performed by: Yoshihiro Arita, Kazumi Totaka
09 Composition: Kenta Nagata / Arranged by: Yoshihiro Arita / Performed by: Yoshihiro Arita with his band
10 Composition: Kenta Nagata / Arranged by: Yoshihiro Arita / Performed by: Yoshihiro Arita with his band
11 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Yoshihiro Arita / Performed by: Yoshihiro Arita with his band, Seiko / Lyrics: Shigeru Miyamoto, Akihito Toda
12 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Yoshihiro Arita / Performed by: Yoshihiro Arita with his band
13 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.)
14 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.)
15 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.)
16 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.)
17 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita / Performed by: The Big Band of Rogues (Tokyo Cuban Boys Jr.)
18 Composition: Koji Kondo / Arranged by: Shigeo Nukita, Yoshihiro Arita / Performed by: All Stars

Recording Engineer: Yuzuru Nakayama (Scitron Digital Contents Inc.), Yasutomo Nogawa (Scitron Digital Contents Inc.)
Mastering Engineer: Yuzuru Nakayama (Scitron Digital Contents Inc.)
